description: A copyCompletion trap is sent at the completion
of a config-copy request. The copyFailCause is not
instantiated, and hence not included in a trap, when
the copyState is success.

Summary.eval: ($v3 == 4) ? 'Config-copy has failed due to $v6' : 'Config-copy completion status : $v3'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyCompletion ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyServerAddress a 192.0.2.1 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopySrcFileName s EXAMPLE ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyState i 1 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyTimeStarted t 31536000 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyTimeCompleted t 31536000 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyFailCause i 1 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyServerV6Address s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEX

description: The IPv4 address of the FTP server from (or to)
which to copy the configuration file. This object
can not be used with zxr10CopyServerV6Address at the
same time. Values of 0.0.0.0 or FF.FF.FF.FF for
copyServerAddress are not allowed.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyServerAddress

description: The source file name (including the path, if applicable) of
the file. This object must be created when either the
copySourceFileType or copyDestFileType has the value
networkFile or localFile.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopySrcFileName

description: Specifies the state of this config-copy request.
This value of this object is instantiated only after
the row has been instantiated, i.e. after the
copyEntryRowStatus has been made active.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyState

description: Specifies the time the copyState last transitioned
to running, or 0 if the state has never transitioned to
running (for e.g., stuck in waiting state).
This object is instantiated only after the row has been
instantiated.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyTimeStarted

description: Specifies the time the copyState last transitioned
from running to successful or failed states. This
object is instantiated only after the row has been
instantiated.
Its value will remain 0 until the request has completed.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyTimeCompleted

description: The reason why the config-copy operation failed.
This object is instantiated only when the copyState
for this entry is in the failed state.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyFailCause

description: The IPv6 address of the FTP server from (or to)
which to copy the configuration file. This object
can not be used with zxr10CopyServerAddress at the
same time.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10CopyServerV6Address

description: A copyCompletion trap is sent at the completion of a tftp
copy request. The copyFailCause is not instantiated, and hence
not included in a trap, when the copyState is success.

Summary.eval: ($v3 == 4) ? 'TFTP copy has failed due to $v6' : 'TFTP copy completion status : $v3'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyCompletion ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyServerAddress a 192.0.2.1 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopySrcFileName s EXAMPLE ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyState i 1 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyTimeStarted t 31536000 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyTimeCompleted t 31536000 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyFailCause i 1 ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyServerV6Address s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEX

description: The IPv4 address of the TFTP server from (or to)
which to copy the configuration file. This object
can not be used with zxr10TFTPCopyServerV6Address
at the same time. Values of 0.0.0.0 or FF.FF.FF.FF
for copyServerAddress are not allowed.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyServerAddress

description: The source file name (including the path, if applicable) of
the file. This object must be created when either the
copySourceFileType or copyDestFileType has the value
networkFile or localFile.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopySrcFileName

description: Specifies the state of this tftp copy request.
This value of this object is instantiated only after
the row has been instantiated, i.e. after the
copyEntryRowStatus has been made active.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyState

description: Specifies the time the copyState last transitioned to running
or 0 if the state has never transitioned to running
(for e.g., stuck in waiting state). This object is instantiated
only after the row has been instantiated.
The value is system uptime.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyTimeStarted

description: Specifies the time the copyState last transitioned from running
to successful or failed states. This object is instantiated
only after the row has been instantiated.
Its value will remain 0 until the request has completed.
The value is system uptime.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyTimeCompleted

description: The reason why the tftp copy operation failed.
This object is instantiated only when the copyState
for this entry is in the failed state.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyFailCause

description: The IPv6 address of the TFTP server from (or to)
which to copy the configuration file. This object
can not be used with zxr10CopyTFTPServerAddress
at the same time.
variables.name: ZXR10-CONFIG-COPY-MIB::zxr10TFTPCopyServerV6Address
